availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Frederick C. Fox (Montgomery County, Ohio, court clerk)

body.p: Montgomery County, Ohio, schoolteacher and clerk. Ohio native. Son of Frederick Fox and Hannah Fox. Married to Elizabeth Fox. Father of Jane R. Fox, W. Scott Fox, Violet Fox, H. Kate Fox, and Minnie A. Fox. Schoolteacher in Montgomery County, Ohio, in 1860. Clerk of the Court of Common Pleas in Montgomery County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Montgomery County, Miami Township, p. 34B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Montgomery County, Miamisburg, p. 118.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Montgomery County, Dayton, 5th Ward, p. 225A.
"Frederick Coffman Fox (1832-1882)," Find A Grave, Memorial 104988201, accessed May 1, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/104988201.
